name: A Little Quiz Named Annie | Musicals | 10 Questions

questions.text: Who played Annie in the original Broadway cast of "Annie"?
questions.explanation:
Andrea McArdle.

	Andrea McArdle's daughter has also been on Broadway, she played Cosette in "Les Misérables."

questions.text: In the 1998 revival, who played Annie?
questions.explanation:
Brittney Kissenger.

	Brittney Kissenger is originally from Ballston Spa. My brother has done shows with her.

questions.text: What is Daddy Warbucks' first name?
questions.explanation:
Oliver.

	In the OBC of "Annie" Oliver Warbucks was played by Reid Shelton.

questions.text: What is the name of Annie's dog?
questions.explanation:
Sandy.

	Rover, Champion, and Tiger are all names suggested by the other orphans before they learn that the dog's name is "Sandy".

questions.text: During what time period does "Annie" take place?
questions.explanation:
The Great Depression.

	1933 was during the Great Depression.

Franklin Roosevelt.

	FDR is a democrat, and Oliver is a Republican.

Charles Strouse.

	Charles Strouse also did the music for the sequel "Annie Warbucks" in 1993. It was an off-Broadway show that is not as well known as "Annie" but is just as good, in my opinion.

questions.text: What was the name of one of Oliver's bodyguards in the 1982 movie?
questions.explanation:
Asp.

	His other bodyguard was Punjab.

Martin Charnin.

	Lee Adams has worked with Strouse, but not on this musical.

questions.text: Complete this lyric to my favorite song in "Annie": "You're never fully dressed without a ______."
questions.explanation:
Smile.

	This movie is very educational if you pay attention closely. You learn a lot about the Great Depression, and what commericals were like on the radio in the 1930's.
